channel.title: Patch an item?
channel.description: I was wondering if it was possible to prevent users from using ::item itemidhere in the case that I wish to reserve that item for a beta party, if so, how?

item.title: Patch an item?
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

what you is in your Client.JAVA seach for

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)
the you will see beside it it says
&& playerRights >= 1) {
change the 1 to 3

Read full topic

item.title: Patch an item?
item.dc:creator: @Cooldude170 Cooldude170
item.description:
@Cooldude170 wrote:

[quote=“swich9999999, post:2, topic:366422”]if you mean ::item as the pickup command then just set the rights to 3 for admin heres the code if (command.startsWith("pickup") && donator > 1 && playerRights > 1) { sM("New command ::item ID AMOUNT"); } if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Type like this ::item ID AMOUNT"); } } }

but if you mean to make an item only wearable buy mod/admin+ here is the code

if(wearID == 28 && (playerRights <= 1)) { // by Owner Santa sM("You Need To Be An Admin To Wear This Whip"); return false; }
you can change the item id’s and the sm if you want but it will only let admins wear this item[/quote]
I am sort of new, where would I insert that?

Read full topic

item.title: Patch an item?
item.dc:creator: @swich9999999 swich9999999
item.description:
@swich9999999 wrote:

if you mean ::item as the pickup command then just set the rights to 3 for admin heres the code if (command.startsWith("pickup") && donator > 1 && playerRights > 1) { sM("New command ::item ID AMOUNT"); } if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Type like this ::item ID AMOUNT"); } } }

but if you mean to make an item only wearable buy mod/admin+ here is the code

if(wearID == 28 && (playerRights <= 1)) { // by Owner Santa sM("You Need To Be An Admin To Wear This Whip"); return false; }
you can change the item id’s and the sm if you want but it will only let admins wear this item

Read full topic
